00031 class EffectCategory {
00032  
00033  public:
00034    
00039    struct CompareEffects {
00040       bool operator()(Effect* a, Effect* b) const {
00041          return (a->GetEffectName() < b->GetEffectName()) ||
00042             ((a->GetEffectName() == b->GetEffectName()) && (a < b));
00043       }
00044    };
00045    
00046    typedef std::set<Effect*, CompareEffects> EffectSet;
00047    
00052    struct CompareCategories {
00053       bool operator()(const EffectCategory* a, const EffectCategory* b) const {
00054          return (a->GetName() < b->GetName()) ||
00055             ((a->GetName() == b->GetName()) && (a < b));
00056       }
00057    };
00058    
00059    typedef std::set<EffectCategory*, CompareCategories> CategorySet;
00060    
00061 
00064    const wxString& GetUri() const;
00065    
00067    const wxString& GetName() const;
00068    
00074    const CategorySet& GetParents() const;
00075    
00078    const CategorySet& GetSubCategories() const;
00079    
00082    EffectSet GetEffects(int type = ALL_EFFECTS) const;
00083    
00086    EffectSet GetAllEffects(int type = ALL_EFFECTS) const;
00087    
00088  protected:
00089    
00092    EffectCategory(const wxString& uri, const wxString& name);
00093 
00099    bool AddParent(EffectCategory* parent);
00100    
00103    bool AddEffect(Effect* effect);
00104    
00112    void FreezeParents();
00113    
00116    void UnfreezeParents();
00117    
00120    bool IsDescendantOf(EffectCategory* category);
00121    
00122    friend class EffectManager;
00123    
00124    wxString mUri;
00125    wxString mName;
00126    CategorySet mParents;
00127    CategorySet mSubCategories;
00128    EffectSet mEffects;
00129    bool mParentsFrozen;
00130    
00131 };
